publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-64 Robin Harper: That the Parliament calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to propose a motion to the Parliament adding Dennis Canavan to the membership of the European Committee.

S1M-64 Robin Harper: European Committee—That the Parliament calls upon the Parliamentary Bureau to propose a motion to the Parliament adding Dennis Canavan to the membership of the European Committee. (lodged on 22 June 1999)
